abstract: HBO’s exclusive telecast of the opening celebration for Barack Obama’s inauguration will now be shown live.
snippet: HBO’s exclusive telecast of the opening celebration for Barack Obama’s inauguration will now be shown live.
lead_paragraph: HBO to show Sunday’s inaugural event live | HBO’s exclusive telecast of the opening celebration for Barack Obama’s inauguration will now be shown live on Sunday, TV Week reports. The premium cable channel had planned to delay the telecast until 7 p.m. The broadcast will now begin at 2:30 p.m., with a replay occurring as scheduled at 7 p.m. (1/14, 7:26 p.m.)

headline.main: HBO to Show Sunday’s Inaugural Event Live
